title: Exclusive Look At Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales' First Boss Battle
summary:
We're less than a month away from the release of Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales, and to celebrate, we at Game Informer got to take an early look at the game and have some sweet new gameplay to share.
In this clip, we find both Miles and Peter Parker squaring off against a familiar foe that fans of the franchise will be happy to see.
Obviously, there are some early-game spoilers here so if you're looking to go in clean, you have been warned!
If you can't get enough from these friendly neighborhood Spider-Men, be sure to check out the reveal of our newest cover and this amazing screenshot gallery, highlighting the beauty of this PlayStation 5 experience.

In this clip, we find both Miles and Peter Parker squaring off against a familiar foe that fans of the franchise will be happy to see. Obviously, there are some early-game spoilers here so if you're looking to go in clean, you have been warned!

If you can't get enough from these friendly neighborhood Spider-Men, be sure to check out the reveal of our newest cover and this amazing screenshot gallery, highlighting the beauty of this PlayStation 5 experience.
